actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bezamide,3,3'-{(2,5-dimethyl-1,4-phenylene)bis{imino(1-acety - 2-oxo-2,1-ethanediyl)azo}}bis{4-chloro-N-(5-chloro-2-methylp henyl)-.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on a specified dye.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bezamide,3,3'-{(2,5-dimethyl-1,4-phenylene)bis{imino(1-acety - 2-oxo-2,1-ethanediyl)azo}}bis{4-chloro-N-(5-chloro-2-methylp henyl)-.
